persona.name: Danielle Reyes
persona.role: Owner of a new coffee shop opening next month
persona.goal: Get Comcast Business internet set up and schedule a callback with a Business Class sales agent to discuss plans and installation timing.
persona.context: She’s signing a lease for a small storefront and needs reliable internet for POS, guest Wi‑Fi, and security cameras. She’s comparing providers and wants a quote and realistic install timeline before committing.

turns.content: Hi there! I’m opening a new coffee shop next month and I’d like to talk to someone about getting Comcast Business internet set up and find out what my options look like.
Congrats on the new coffee shop! To get your internet options set up, could you share your first and last name?

messages: Congrats on the new coffee shop! To get your internet options set up, could you share your first and last name?

turns.content: Thanks! My name is Danielle Reyes.
Great, Danielle. Just to confirm, this is for your coffee‑shop business, correct?

messages: Great, Danielle. Just to confirm, this is for your coffee‑shop business, correct?

turns.content: Yes, that’s right—it’s for my new coffee shop.
Got it. When would you like to speak with a Business Class sales agent? Please let me know a preferred date (at least tomorrow) and time, and your time zone.

messages: Got it. When would you like to speak with a Business Class sales agent? Please let me know a preferred date (at least tomorrow) and time, and your time zone.

turns.content: Ideally tomorrow or the following day between 10:00 AM and 1:00 PM, Pacific Time. If that window doesn’t work, early next week around the same time would be fine too.

Great, Danielle. I’ve scheduled a call for Tuesday, Dec 16 at 10:30 AM Pacific Time with a Business Class sales agent. You’ll receive a text with the phone number to call about 5 minutes before your appointment.

messages: Great, Danielle. I’ve scheduled a call for Tuesday, Dec 16 at 10:30 AM Pacific Time with a Business Class sales agent. You’ll receive a text with the phone number to call about 5 minutes before your appointment.

turns.content: Perfect, thank you for setting that up. I’ll be ready for the call and will look out for the text with the number.

You’re all set, Danielle. Your call is scheduled for Tuesday, Dec 16 at 10:30 AM Pacific Time. You’ll receive a text with the phone number to call about 5 minutes before the appointment. If anything changes, just let us know. Good luck with the coffee shop!
